The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 04 July is 45,381 (5,230.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 29 June, there were 1,048 new confirmed cases (120.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 June, there were 614 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 71% (434 extra cases).
